questions.question: Identify the incorrect statement regarding a controller.?

answers.a: A controller is a comparator that compares the input signal with the reference signal.
answers.b: Input given to comparator is error signal.
answers.c: PD controller acts as a low pass filter

questions.question: The function of the proportional mode is to ____________?

answers.c: To speed up the response and minimize the overshoot

questions.question: The function of the proportional plus derivative mode is to ____________?

answers.c: To speed up the response and minimize the overshoot

questions.question: The function of the proportional plus integral mode is to ____________

answers.c: To speed up the response and minimize the overshoot
